We're looking for a senior systems engineer to help architect, build and maintain the infrastructure that our products are built and run on. Youâ€™ll recommend and implement system and environment wide improvements, new technologies, and contribute to our technological direction.

Stack: Ruby, Clojure, Go, Ruby on Rails, PostgreSQL, MongoDB, Redis, InfluxDB, Kafka, AWS, Docker, Kubernetes, Terraform, Puppet. We are actively moving our frontend to React.

To apply email your resume to jobs@nationbuilder.com with the subject "Senior Systems Engineer." In a few sentences, tell us why you're a good fit for the job and which NationBuilder value you identify with the most and why.
